TopicTitle: Up to date science list mod?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I would like a mod that shows which kinds of science I have already done or can do, depending on the biome. I know that there is a mod called [x] Science on Curse, but it seems to be out of date, only supporting 0.23.

Is there a more recent mod that accomplishes this?

Thx.
Hello, there's an update of [x] Science on KerbalStuff : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/107661-k
Oh, Thanks! I wasn't aware of this.
